## Read data
```{r}
excel_sheets("raw_data/Cardisoma Palatability.xlsx")


master_raw <- read_excel("raw_data/Cardisoma Palatability.xlsx", sheet = "Master") %>% 
  clean_names()

trials_25w <- read_excel("raw_data/Cardisoma Palatability.xlsx", sheet = "25w Trials") %>% clean_names()

trials_d50 <- read_excel("raw_data/Cardisoma Palatability.xlsx", sheet = "D50 Trials") %>% clean_names()

##Compare with 25s trials
sheet3 <- read_excel("raw_data/Cardisoma Palatability.xlsx", sheet = "Sheet3") %>% clean_names()

```

## Cleaning
```{r}

master_clean <- master_raw %>% 
  select(1:9) %>% 
  mutate(start_time = as_hms(tx_start),
         end_time = as_hms(tx_end)) %>% 
  select(-tx_start, -tx_end) %>% 
  rename(crab_bucket_weight = c_b_wt_g)

#start_time = format(tx_start, format = "%H:%M:%S"

```

Unit of weight = Grams

```{r}
## checking

crab_count <- master_clean %>% 
  group_by(food) %>% 
  tally()
# matches summary table in xlsx

str(master_clean)

```

## Save data
```{r}
write_csv(master_clean, here::here("clean_data/2010_palmyra_atoll_cardisoma_palatability.csv"))

```
